Tunable.name: ATTRACTION_RELATIONSHIP_TRACK
Tunable.description: The unidirectional relationship track that represents how attracted the actor sim is towards the target sim.

Tunable.name: BASE_ATTRACTION_VALUE
Tunable.description: The intial value of attraction from an actor sim towards a target sim when calculating attraction. Turn Ons and Turn Offs add their attraction modifiers to this value to calculate the total attraction.

TunableList.name: LOOT_BEFORE_ATTRACTION_FIRST_ADDED
TunableList.description: Loot actions that are applied right before an attraction track is first added for the actor sim towards the target sim.

TunableList.name: LOOT_ON_ATTRACTION_ADDED
TunableList.description: Loot actions that are applied right after an attraction track is first added for the actor sim towards the target sim.

TdescFragTag.name: TRACK_ATTRACTION_TESTS
TdescFragTag.description: If these tests pass for the actor and target, then we will track the actor's attraction towards the target.

Tunable.name: UNKNOWN_DESCRIPTION
Tunable.description: The description to use in the Sim Profile when the active sim does not know the attraction that the target sim feels towards the active sim.

Tunable.name: UNKNOWN_ICON
Tunable.description: The icon to display in the Sim Profile when the active sim does not know the attraction that the target sim feels towards the active sim.

Tunable.name: UNKNOWN_TITLE
Tunable.description: The title to use in the Sim Profile when the active sim does not know the attraction that the target sim feels towards the active sim.
